description: This file defines a React component named BehaviorHeatmap that renders a heatmap visualization of behavioral data. It accepts props such as behaviors, rows of heat data, labels, formatting functions, and styling options. It also handles user interactions like clicking and hovering over heatmap cells, and navigates to a timeline page based on cell clicked or custom callback.

methods.name: cellBg
methods.description: Generates a background style for a heatmap cell based on its intensity and the maximum intensity.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events on heatmap cells, either invoking a provided callback or navigating to a URL based on the behavior ID and hour.
